frame.name: Employing
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Employer</fen> employs an <fen>Employee</fen> whose <fen>Position</fen> entails that the <fen>Employee</fen> perform certain <fen>Task</fen>s in exchange for <fen>Compensation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Emper">I</fex> <t>employed</t> <fex name="Empee">him</fex> <fex name="Posit">as Chief Gardener</fex> <fex name="Dur">for ten years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Compensation
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing a <fen>Task</fen>.
</def-root>

FE.name: Employee
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Employee</fen> denotes the person who is obligated to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Empee">I</fex> was <t>employed</t> by an international corporation.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Employer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Employer</fen> is the person (or institution) that gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Emper">I</fex> <t>employed</t> him as Chief Gardener for ten years.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Field
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Field</fen> identifies the field in which the <fen>Employee</fen> is employed.
<ex>He was <t>employed</t><fex name="Field">in finance</fex> fourteen years ago.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Manner</fen> identifies the way in which an <fen>Employer</fen> hires an <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>The three young men were given medals and <fex name="Manner">hastily</fex> <t>commissioned</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Place</fen> identifies the location where the <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Actually, he <t>employed</t> me <fex name="Place"> at the downtown office </fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Position
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Position</fen> indicates a particular type of employment.
<ex>I'm not <t>employed</t> <fex name="Position">as your waitress</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Purpose</fen> identifies what the <fen>Employer</fen> intends to accomplish through the hiring of the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>John <t>employs</t> bodyguards <fex name="Purpose">to protect him from previous clients</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Task
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Task</fen> indicates the action/duty that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>I am <t>employed</t> <fex name="Task">to collect the trash</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Time</fen> identifies the time at whcih the <fen>Employer</fen> hires the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Charles has been an <t>employee</t> of Microsoft <fex name="Time">since 1998</fex>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Duration
FE.definition:
<def-root>The FE <fen>Duration</fen> identifies the amount of time for which the <fen>Employee</fen> continues in employ.
<ex>I <t>employed</t> him as Chief Gardener <fex name="Dur">for ten years</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Contract_basis
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Contract_basis</fen> is the condition of employment with respect to permanency, hours per time period or payment arrangements.
<ex>Chrysler <t>employs</t> 1000 skilled worker <fex name="Contract_basis">full-time</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE describes a characteristic of the <fen>Employee</fen>.
<ex>Electronic theft by foreign and industrial spies and <fex name="Descriptor">disgruntled</fex> <t>employees</t> is costing U.S. companies billions and eroding their international competitive advantage.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Subgroup
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Subgroup</fen> is the department or subdivision of the institution that the <fen>Employee</fen> is a member of. <ex>He is an <t>employee</t> <fex name="Subgroup">in the marketing department</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: employ.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: give work to (someone) and pay them for it.

lexUnit.name: employer.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person that employs people

lexUnit.name: employee.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person that is employed for wage or salary

lexUnit.name: commission.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: order or authorize (someone) to do or produce something

lexUnit.name: personnel.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: people employed in an organization or engaged in an organized undertaking

lexUnit.name: staff.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the employees of a particular organization
